lines.text: Well, it was two in the morning, so... maybe he needed some light?
Don't think so. The lights work fine.
Um... well, maybe they were off, and Slick was between him and the switch by the door.
Don't think so- the lights were on when we showed up.
Well, I d-don't suppose you'll believe me, but yes.
I d-didn't tamper with the crime scene, but I especially didn't tamper with- with the lights.
...Uh, well, whatever. My idea didn't explain much anyway.
